Intervention: Active Monitoring Group on Health Education
Eligibility: Capacity and willingness to complete study procedures, including online questionnaires, assessments and psycho-educational video

Any condition that results in the inability to complete study procedures (e.g., education, cognitive capacity, mental condition, medical condition) or lack of Internet and telephone access that would prevent participation in study procedures - at the investigator's discretion.
In the course of legal proceedings on account of pain or disability
Results: - Evaluation of participants (0-6) for satisfaction, usefulness of the information presented, relevance, ease of understanding and likelihood of using competency learning
The odds are on a scale of 0 to 6 points (e.g. 0 = completely useless and 6 = very useful).
Title of the arm/group: Active Control Group
Description of the Arm/Group: Active Health Education Control Group
Unit of measure: units on a scale Easy to understand: 5,9 (.3)
Title of the arm/group: My surgical success treatment group
Description of the arm/group: My surgical success intervention group
Unit of measure: units on a scale Easy to understand: 5,9 (.2)
